title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Dave Wannstedt on Fields Doubters, Tua 2.0, Steelers QB Battle
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Dave Wannstedt on Fields Doubters, Tua 2.0, Steelers QB Battle
description:
First, (3:00) Colin explains why the Vikings and Kirk Cousins will shine without Mike Zimmer around.

Then, former Bears and Dolphins HC and FOX NFL analyst Dave Wannstedt joins Colin to discuss how USC and UCLA will adapt to the B1G (8:00), if the new Bears regime is committed to Justin Fields (13:00), if the Steelers will start Kenny Pickett over Mitchell Trubisky in Week 1 (25:00), if Tua can have a breakout year in Mike McDaniel’s QB friendly offense (28:00), and why the Niners can't keep Jimmy G around another year (33:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
